definitions.definition: The obsolete name for a psychotic disorder , now called delusional disorder , often (in one of six subtypes) characterized by delusions of persecution and a perceived threat against the individual affected with the disorder, and often associated with false accusations and a general mistrust of others

main_definition: The obsolete name for a psychotic disorder , now called delusional disorder , often (in one of six subtypes) characterized by delusions of persecution and a perceived threat against the individual affected with the disorder, and often associated with false accusations and a general mistrust of others
